Sentencas: In order to develop a cathode that can be used in intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells, a family of iron perovskites with the general formula Ln(0.5)M(0.5)FeO(3-delta) (A = Ln(1-x)M(x); Ln = La, Nd and/or Pr; M = Sr, Ca or/and Ba) with fixed divalent dopant concentration x to 0.5, mean A cation radius < r(A)> to 1.25 angstrom but with different A cation size disorder sigma(2)(r(A)) has been prepared by the conventional solid state reaction.
Titulo: Effect of the A Cation Size Disorder on the Properties of an Iron Perovskite Series for Their Use as Cathodes for SOFCs

Sentencas: These compounds have been characterised by power X-ray diffraction (XRD), high-resolution scanning electron microscopy (SEM), electrical conductivity, I-V measurements and AC impedance spectroscopy.
Titulo: Effect of the A Cation Size Disorder on the Properties of an Iron Perovskite Series for Their Use as Cathodes for SOFCs

Sentencas: All the samples have a rhombohedral crystal structure (space group: R-3c).
Titulo: Effect of the A Cation Size Disorder on the Properties of an Iron Perovskite Series for Their Use as Cathodes for SOFCs

Sentencas: SEM images show that the average grain size increases with increasing sigma(2)(r(A)) in the bulk samples.
Titulo: Effect of the A Cation Size Disorder on the Properties of an Iron Perovskite Series for Their Use as Cathodes for SOFCs

Sentencas: The DC four-probe measurements indicate that electrical conductivity is strongly dependent on the sigma(2)(r(A)).
Titulo: Effect of the A Cation Size Disorder on the Properties of an Iron Perovskite Series for Their Use as Cathodes for SOFCs

Sentencas: Electrochemical impedance spectra at 700 and 800 degrees C revealed that better electrochemical cathode performances are for samples with smaller values of sigma(2)(r(A)).
Titulo: Effect of the A Cation Size Disorder on the Properties of an Iron Perovskite Series for Their Use as Cathodes for SOFCs
